translation.welcome:
<prosody pitch=""2st"">Hi there!</prosody>  <break time=""0.2s""/>  Today is <say-as interpret-as="date" format="ymd" detail=""2"">
    {{date}}  </say-as>  and this is your voice briefing <break time="0.5s"/>
translation.welcome_written: Welcome ðŸ‘‹. This is your Voice Briefing. Which topic would you like headlines for?
translation.initial_topic: Which voice assistant would you like to hear the latest stories about?
translation.which_article: Which story would you like to hear more about?
translation.next_moves: Would you like to hear the next story or the list of topics?
translation.next_moves_written: Next story or the list of topics?
translation.possible_topics: Would you like to hear the latest stories about the Google Assistant, Alexa, Siri, Cortana, or Bixby?
translation.ask_to_send_reminder: You can always let me know if you would like me to send you the link to the full story.
translation.account_linking_explanation: I'll need you to link your account so I can send the story to your email. So
translation.email.sent.confirmation: Okay, I just sent you the story.  You might want to check your spam folder.
translation.acountlink_canceled: Sorry, you'll need to link your account so I can send the story to your email.
translation.acountlink_error: Sorry, there was a problem linking your account. It needs to be linked so I can send the story to your email.
translation.unhandled_question: Would you like to hear the list of topics?
translation.help_menu: I'm best at giving you an update on the exciting world of voice. I can keep you updated on the latest developments with the Google Assistant, Alexa, Siri, Cortana, or Bixby.
translation.help_menu_written: I'm best at giving you an update the exciting world of voice ðŸ”Š. I can keep you updated on the latest developments with the Google Assistant, Alexa, Siri, Cortana, or Bixby.
translation.about: I'm the Voice Briefing Assistant. I'm here to give you an update on everything that is going on in the exciting world of voice. In case you were wondering, I was created by the team at Vecgraph.com. If you're having trouble feel free to ask me for some help.
